main event: An observer sighted a bright white light in the sky on 20 Aug 1959.
interesting points: The light was stationary at first, then started moving rapidly and oscillating back and forth., The observer was driving in an automobile at the time., The object was described as quite close or quite large., The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes., The conclusion suggests that the sighting may have been of a satellite.
sighted object: bright white light in the sky
